name: Caffe Latte
details: Fresh brewed coffee and steamed milk

name: Espresso
details: Strong black coffee made by forcing steam through ground coffee beans

name: Cappuccino
details: Equal parts of espresso, steamed milk, and milk foam

name: Mocha
details: Espresso with steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream

name: Americano
details: Espresso with added hot water, giving it a similar strength to, but different flavor from traditionally brewed coffee

name: Macchiato
details: Espresso 'stained' with a small amount of steamed milk

name: Affogato
details: A scoop of vanilla gelato 'drowned' in a shot of hot espresso

name: Flat White
details: Espresso with velvety steamed milk

name: Turkish Coffee
details: Finely ground coffee brewed by boiling in water with sugar

name: Iced Coffee
details: Chilled coffee with ice cubes

name: Irish Coffee
details: Coffee with a shot of Irish whiskey and topped with cream

name: Vietnamese Coffee
details: Strong coffee brewed with a drip filter and served with sweetened condensed milk

name: Frappuccino
details: Blended coffee with ice and various flavors

name: Breve
details: Espresso with steamed half-and-half instead of milk

name: Mocha Latte
details: Espresso with steamed milk, chocolate syrup, and whipped cream

name: Red Eye
details: Coffee with a shot of espresso

name: Green Tea Latte
details: Green tea with steamed milk

name: Chai Latte
details: Spiced tea with steamed milk

name: White Chocolate Mocha
details: Espresso with steamed milk, white chocolate syrup, and whipped cream
